11_16w7UuJAHbt8YBa8zxHS7UFk9mq8Q5DpE4.body: Yes legally, but no not really. The state could say "we're not part of the US" and they could back it up as much as they want... The armed forces *will* take them back. There is also the whole International-level politics, and the US allies most likely would not even recognize a independent California. Remember, Texas tried this once... You could have the entirety of the United States' Armed forces vs. at most the California National Guard and a few citizens with guns. It would not be a good Idea on California's part.
